Make a bird feeder out of a plastic bottle: Cut a small hole in the top of the bottle and fill it with birdseed. Hang the bottle from a tree or post to attract birds.

Create a DIY hydroponic herb garden: Use a plastic bottle to create a hydroponic herb garden. Cut the bottom half of the bottle and fill it with water and nutrients. You can then place herbs in the top half of the bottle and use the bottom half as a root system.
